section.heading: Women's National Democratic Club; Lot 5, Square 135.

para.text: The real property located at 1526 New Hampshire Avenue, N.W., known for tax and assessment purposes as Lot 5, Square 135, shall be exempt from the tax imposed by Chapter 8 of this title as long as Women's National Democratic Club is the owner of the property, subject to the provisions of §§ 47-1007 and 47-1009, but not § 47-1005.
The tax exemption provided by this section shall begin as of October 1, 2017.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90-day) creation of this section, see § 7292(b) of the Fiscal Year 2018 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2017, effective July 20, 2017 (D.C. Act 22-104; 64 DCR 7032).

For temporary (90-day) creation of this section, see § 7292(b) of the Fiscal Year 2018 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2017, effective October 24, 2017 (D.C. Act 22-167; 64 DCR 10802).
Section 7292(b) of D.C. Law 22-33 added § 47-1009 which had previously been added by D.C. Law 12-160, therefore section 7292(b) of D.C. Law 22-33 has been codified here as § 47-1009.01.
